channel.title: heap on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in heap on Today I Learned

item.description: Hello World. Profiling golang projects # .go file import ( _ "net/http/pprof" ) # bash $ curl -sK -v localhost:30020/debug/pprof/heap > heap.out $ go tool pprof heap.out (pprof) png Generating report in profile001.png (pprof) exit Output in png requires graphviz (brew install graphviz) Fix tmux configuration issues when upgrading iTerm2 and tmux version 2.9 to 3.1b unbind } ==> unbind "{" unbind { ==> unbind "{" bind \ if '[ ===> bind \\ if '[ Scrolling in iTerm and tmux, fixed by
